sentences.sContent: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.sCn: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.sContent: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.sCn: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.sContent: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.sCn: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

sentences.sContent: ...finds that the best way to ensure employees are “engaged” is to give them more control over where and how they do their work―which may mean liberating them from having to do everything in collaboration with others...
...I could tell you everything about every day after that...
...But not everything is to be blamed on techeology...
...and do everything possible to fulfill their duties...
...and I have to keep everything in the kitchen totally clean...
...they expect everything under the suit: in addition to being committed...
...They chose their rooms and paid for everything online...

phrases.pCn: 一切事物；以及其他等等
[口语]具有各种优点(或吸引力、所需之物等)
